sentences.en: In her conclusion, the author sounds a cautionary note.
sentences.cn: 作者在结尾时敲响了警钟。

sentences.en: Barely fifteen months later, it has become a cautionary tale of the pitfalls of international mergers and acquisitions.
sentences.cn: 15个月刚过，这便成了一个有关国际并购陷阱的警世故事。

sentences.en: Venus has long been held up as a cautionary tale for everything that could go wrong on a planet like earth.
sentences.cn: 长期以来，金星一直被认为是一个警示故事，告诉我们在像地球这样的行星上，任何事情都可能出错。
